# The `ThreadPoolStrategy` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This tells how a thread pool will be used. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This tells how a thread pool will be used.

Definition at line 115 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/threading-h">Threading.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### apply&#95;thread&#95;strategy() {#a91973a96c25c9148226db40b463b5681}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::ThreadPoolStrategy::apply&#95;thread&#95;strategy (unsigned ThreadPoolNum) const</>}>
Assign the current thread to an ideal hardware CPU or NUMA node.

In a multi-socket system, this ensures threads are assigned to all CPU sockets. <code>ThreadPoolNum</code> represents a number bounded by &#91;0, <a href="#ac128c3b3bd0420224f86d2c385f3af99">compute&#95;thread&#95;count()</a>).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/threading-h/#l00139">139</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/threading-h">Threading.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### compute&#95;cpu&#95;socket() {#a3377000f840bf21702914c7d552af21d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; unsigned &gt; llvm::ThreadPoolStrategy::compute&#95;cpu&#95;socket (unsigned ThreadPoolNum) const</>}>
Finds the CPU socket where a thread should go.

Returns &#39;std::nullopt&#39; if the thread shall remain on the actual CPU socket.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/threading-h/#l00143">143</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/threading-h">Threading.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### compute&#95;thread&#95;count() {#ac128c3b3bd0420224f86d2c385f3af99}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned llvm::ThreadPoolStrategy::compute&#95;thread&#95;count () const</>}>
Retrieves the max available threads for the current strategy.

This accounts for affinity masks and takes advantage of all CPU sockets.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/threading-h/#l00133">133</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/threading-h">Threading.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/threading-cpp/#l00041">41</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/threading-cpp">Threading.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
